Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Mary Magdalene:

Text.Language: <ere y/etacnau m~Po#c#: menenca n~te tefa~nactacic: ,ere y/eyouab ]faicojen: ]a~gia Maria ]magdalin/.
Hail to her who saw the Lord after his resurrection. Hail to the holy myrrh-bearer; St. Mary Magdalene.
السالم للتى رأت الرب: بعد قيامته: السالم للقديسة حاملة الطيب: القديسة مريم المجدلية.
